abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32101510, pmid32238223, pmid32241022, pmid32240128, pmid32229322, pmid32234804, pmid32238232, pmid32233876
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.04.03
